personalInfo.clubAffl: Capital City Club (Atlanta, Georgia); Druid Hills GC (Atlanta, Georgia)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished T51 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Competed on the eGolf Professional Tour from 2010 to 2014 and collected five victories. Was the Money List Leader in 2012. 

2009: Qualified for the U.S. Open at Bethpage State Park and finished T40.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: 2007 British Amateur Champion...2009 U.S. Walker Cup Team Member...2008 and 2009 NCAA Academic All-American...2009 NCAA All-American 3rd Team...2009 All ACC Team.
tourBios.personal: Would choose "Touch the Sky" by Kanye West as his entrance song on the first tee...Biggest thrill outside golf was marrying his wife, Elizabeth, in 2013...Lists the Charlotte Hornets and Carolina Panthers as his favorite professional sports teams as a kid and as an adult...Lists President George W. Bush as the most famous person he has met when he played golf with him at Shinnecock Hills in 2013...Would like to be featured in Garden and Gun Magazine because he enjoys their articles on southern culture and loves living in the South.

tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Finished T7 at the Florida Qualifying Tournament, carding rounds of 67-69-68-66...Competed in 12 events on the Mackenzie Tour - PGA TOUR Canada in 2015...After 54 holes at the season-opening PC Financial Open was T2...Caught fire Sunday, highlighted by a final-hole birdie and a berth into a five-way playoff. Birdied all three playoff holes to defeat Ross Beal, Riley Wheeldon, Taylor Pendrith and Adam Svensson to capture his first Mackenzie Tour title...The following week, claimed a top-10 finish at the Bayview Place Island Savings Open at Uplands GC...Finished No. 8 on the Order of Merit to earn an exemption into the final stage of Web.com Tour Q-School.
tourBios.personal: Favorite course is Augusta National and hopes to play Cypress Point someday...Favorite sports team is the Carolina Panthers...Dream foursome would include Bobby Jones, Jack Nicklaus and Tiger Woods...Twitter account is @Drew_Weaver.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was 1st in 2015 at the PC Financial Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T56th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
